mapper.select: select store_code as storeCode from t_sys_store where user_code = #{userCode}

select g.goods_name as goodsName, g.goods_image_path as goodsImagePath, g.goods_introduce as goodsIntroduce, g.goods_price as goodsPrice, d.goods_count as goodsCount, d.goods_code as goodsCode, d.order_code as orderCode from t_sys_order_detail d, t_sys_goods g where d.goods_code = g.goods_code and d.is_delete = 0
mapper.update: update t_sys_order set order_active = #{orderActive}, version = version + 1, last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser}, last_update_time = now() where order_code = #{orderCode} and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select order_code as orderCode, order_active as orderActive, sum_price as sumPrice, puchar_num as pucharNum, pay_time as payTime, o.version as version, a1.area_name as provinceName, a2.area_name as cityName, a3.area_name as areaName, s.address as address, u.user_code as userCode, u.user_name as userName, u.user_phone as phone, s.store_name as storeName from t_sys_order o, t_sys_store s, t_sys_user u, t_sys_area a1, t_sys_area a2, t_sys_area a3 where o.is_delete = 0 and a1.area_code = s.province_code and a2.area_code = s.city_code and a3.area_code = s.area_code and o.store_code = s.store_code and u.user_code = o.user_code and s.store_code = o.store_code and o.order_code = #{orderCode} order by pay_time desc
